entry.title: Detective Diaries | QnA! Meet the Team 😎

media:group.media:title: Detective Diaries | QnA! Meet the Team 😎
media:group.media:description:
My, my, my goodness!! I didn't think there'd be so many people!! Thank you everyone for joining us, we couldn't ask for anything more!
This project has been quite the journey, taking over 10 months to complete... Me and the team will be talking about that today, along with many other things! Feel free to ask us questions, and we can talk and chat about anything 😎
We're glad you're here to see the development of Crash Landing Studios. Stick around for more, as more shall come!
Website, for our projects and artworks! https://crashlandingstudios.com
Twitter, to keep up to date! https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio
Discord, if you'd like to chat with us! https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2
See you soon!
CREDITS: DIRECTION Myxo Ch. | https://twitter.com/ChMyxo
SOUND & MIXING Reddunc | https://twitter.com/Reddunc Juice | https://twitter.com/mmm_juicey

media:group.media:title: Detective Diaries | Hololive Animation
media:group.media:description:
An amateur detective investigates a fishy mystery.
After 9 months in the making, Crash Landing Studios' debut Hololive fan animation is finally here! We're very excited to show everyone the fruits of our work.
Website: https://www.crashlandingstudios.com/ Crash Landing Studios Twitter: https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio Our Discord: https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2 (come chat with our community!!)
#detectivediaries #hololive #vtuber @Watson Amelia Ch. hololive-EN

entry.title: A Warm Winter - Behind the Scenes!

media:group.media:title: A Warm Winter - Behind the Scenes!
media:group.media:description:
WOW! Never thought I'd be able to finish this project. So, so many things I had to figure out on the fly. So many. So... many...
Anyways, I'll be showing a breakdown of how I created the animation! There are a god-awful number of steps, but I'll try and keep it short 😎 https://twitter.com/Kuri_Woo
Website, for all of my artworks and content: https://myxoch.com
Twitter, to keep up to date: https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio
Discord, to get more involved: https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2
Thanks for stopping by!
0:00 Intro 7:35 Start 8:25 Background 9:54 2D or 3D? 13:25 BOTH! 16:38 Characters - Design 19:37 Characters - Modelling & Rigging 21:30 Characters - Texturing 24:22 Characters - Hair 26:54 Characters - Clothes 30:35 Characters - Face Rigging 33:59 Environments - Modelling 41:56 Environments - Lighting 46:27 Animating 1:01:08 Simulation 1:04:23 Compositing 1:07:00 That's it! 1:07:32 Miscellaneous Chatting

media:group.media:title: A Warm Winter | Hololive Animation
media:group.media:description:
It might be cold, but it's nothing a cozy Christmas can't fix!
Ame has told Gura about some sort of... christmas surprise? What could it be?
After 2 months of serious work, my first fully 3D animated short is finally completed! This has been quite the learning experience, and you can bet there's gonna be a whole lot more in the future.
HUGE, and I mean HUGE (Huge!!) ups to Woo for composing the score!! I don't know how you do it, but you're basically a musical god and I'm very happy to be able to work with you. Hell yeah. Check him out! Now! https://twitter.com/Kuri_Woo
Thanks to all my viewers who helped me out and gave me company while I created this short! Without yall, we wouldn't have nearly as many easter eggs and stuff.
Website, for all of my artworks and content: https://myxoch.com
Twitter, to keep up to date: https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio
Discord, to get more involved: https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2
Thanks for stopping by!

media:group.media:title: 【Art】BAR COCO - Breakdown/Behind the Scenes!
media:group.media:description:
Here's a small breakdown of the process for making Bar Coco! Paintings, animations, 3D, sound, all of that, I'll be going over today!
Website, for all of my artworks and content: https://myxoch.com
Twitter, to keep up to date: https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio
Discord, to get more involved: https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2
Thanks for stopping by!

media:group.media:title: Bar Coco | Hololive Animation
media:group.media:description:
A loving bartender spends her last grand night with her friends.
After two weeks of work, Bar Coco is finished! Even if Coco is leaving Hololive, she will continue to be an inspiration to millions of artists, musicians, and creators, including myself. I hope you enjoy!
H U G E thank you to @Kuri_Woo who composed the incredible music for this film - without you, this film would have fallen flat on its face haha. (no seriously, Woo has carried the entire past two films now. Absolute god.) More variations on the theme will be coming soon, so keep an eye out for that! Follow him now, or else. https://twitter.com/Kuri_Woo
Thank you to the viewers who helped me out with several of the paintings! It gives a quality that I could never achieve on my own.
Website, for all of my artworks and content: https://myxoch.com
Twitter, to keep up to date: https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio
Discord, to get more involved: https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2
Thanks for stopping by!

entry.title: Crash Landing | Episode 1 - A Burning Ship

media:group.media:title: Crash Landing | Episode 1 - A Burning Ship
media:group.media:description:
A socially rejected alien accidentally possesses a streamer, and must now learn to live like a human.
If you've been curious about the story behind me and my host, here's a short film I've been working on that shows how I... crash-landed here, haha...
Made with Blender, Photoshop, and Sony Vegas. Various sounds from Freesound.org
Website, for all of my artworks and content: https://myxoch.com
Twitter, to keep up to date: https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio
Discord, to get more involved: https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2

media:group.media:title: 【Art】Behind-The-Scenes, Thoughts, and the Next Project!
media:group.media:description:
Now that the film has been released, there's a few things I'd like to share with you that I couldn't share before!
Website, for all of my artworks and content: https://myxoch.com
Twitter, to keep up to date: https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio
Discord, to get more involved: https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2
Thanks for stopping by!

media:group.media:title: Fleeting Time | Hololive Animation
media:group.media:description:
Fleeting Time is a film about two friends who must face their differences in lifespan.
After two and a half weeks of hard work, the film is finally completed! This is one of the most complex films I have made to date. I hope you enjoy!
A MASSIVE thank you to @Kuri_Woo for composing the entire film score!!! You are awesome to work with and you somehow captured the mood perfectly despite my absurdly vague feedback, haha. Without your help, this film would not have been nearly the same. https://twitter.com/Kuri_Woo
And thank you to my viewers who helped me create the environments and bits of storytelling for this little world! I hope we can continue creating stories together 😎
Website, for all of my artworks and content: https://myxoch.com
Twitter, to keep up to date: https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio
Discord, to get more involved: https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2
Thanks for stopping by!

media:group.media:title: 999 | Hololive Animation
media:group.media:description:
999 is an animatic film in which Ame tries to save Ina from The Ancient Ones.
Phew, this series took a while! I've been trying to blur the line between film and painting, and this is probably the farthest I have gone with it. Keep an eye out for the next series!
Made with Photoshop, Blender, and Sony Vegas. Various sounds from Freesound.org Music: Dova Syndrome - Beyond Redemption
Website: https://www.myxoch.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio
Discord: https://discord.gg/FkWtKHc3V2

media:group.media:title: Departure | Hololive Animatic
media:group.media:description:
Departure is a series that aims to capture the emotional moments leading up to the departure of a friend.
And with that, the series is officially over! Thanks everyone for sticking around, this is the final product after 8 consecutive days of creating illustrations! Stick around for more, we have a lot to come!
Website: https://www.myxoch.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CrashLandStudio
MUSIC: Dova Syndrome - 千歳の如く
